here is one that we should ALL use so that we ALL speak the same "language":

Legio scale: 

10 = Blue ray quality
9   = DVD quality
8   = Excellent
7   = Superior
6   = Very good
5   = standard quality
4   = Bellow standard
3   = extra bellow quality
2   = Horrible
1   = crap
0   = unwatchable

THIS movie thus:
